reviewText: It's the greatest movie of the cossacks ever made.
I read the book. So I did not need to understand the language. Awesome/

Four dvds, 426 ninutes, it's a real study.  Dvd #4 has 96 minutes of extras.  The movie is 33o minutes long.

Acting is very good.  Cinematography is very good,  It is 54 years old but the transfer is good.

I have 4 players but the blu-ray player locked up now and then.  My other players worked fine.
